short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension by MyAnatomy designed to elevate integrity and security of online assessments

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MAPIT Proctor serves a distinct purpose within the online assessment environment, primarily focused on ensuring the security and integrity of test-taking processes and offers several tangible benefits for educational institutions, recruiters, test-takers. Its primary objectives as follows:


Robust Test Security:
MAPIT Proctor significantly enhances test security by actively monitoring and identifying potential security threats related to unauthorized extensions or manual added scripts to reduce the circumvention of proctor.
This robust security feature ensures the credibility and fairness of the assessment process.

Vulnerability Verification:
The extensionâ€™s ability to verify the status of installed extensions and help detect violated extensions that have an unfair advantage during the test.
This proactive approach by blocking violated extensions through complete test adds an extra layer of protection.

Test Integrity Assurance:
By blocking the start of a test until any unwanted extensions are disabled, MAPIT Proctor ensures that all candidates take the test under consistent and fair conditions, reducing the likelihood of cheating or unauthorized aids.
